title: StarCraft II - Wings of Liberty - Behind the Scenes
description:
English

This is a direct copy of the bonus DVD from the StarCraft II - Wings of Liberty Collector's Edition. It contains over two hours of artist and designer interviews, cinematics with director's commentary, and a starcraft retrospective.

Opening the folder with VLC's "Open Disk..." option enables the complete DVD menu with all its features (subtitles, commentary tracks, different audio options, etc).
